channel.title: Roundup on Graham Helton
channel.description: Recent content in Roundup on Graham Helton

item.title: Weekly Roundup #1: December 12-19th 2021
item.description: What is this? This is the first of a weekly “round up” that aims to summarize the security or IT related concepts I have worked on this week during my free time. My goal is to create a footprint for others to follow in if they so desire. When I was first learning the basics of security I struggled to find projects that I could work on to help me learn useful security practices and techniques.
